name: OFFROAD VECHILE:SPIN-TIRES MOD
description:
OFFROAD VECHILE:SPIN-TIRES MOD is an off-road driving simulatior game. Try not to damage your vehicle or sink and stuck in the mud! This well designed challenge will test your driving skill and endurance. Enjoy the responsibility of operating large vehicles and venture across the rugged landscapes. The terrain is real-time deformable! Select and get in a truck, start the engine, turn off the park break and speed up! You can also select the drive mode: all-wheel drive, rear-wheel drive and front-wheel drive!




Features:
-Drive mode select:AWD, RWD an FWD
-Real-time deformable terrain
-Rotable camera
-Large selection of vehicles
